products.title: COSRX Slow Ageing Night Repair Duo (For Dry Skin)
products.description:
This powerful 2-step routine is designed to combat fine lines, wrinkles, and extreme dryness. If you’re concerned about extreme dryness and signs of aging, this simple routine effectively targets wrinkles while keeping your skin deeply hydrated. For best results: Use consistently for at least 3-4 months.

  • How to Layer the Routine:

    1. Step 1: Retinol Oil After cleansing and toning, apply the Retinol Oil to your face. Retinol should always go first since it's the active ingredient targeting fine lines and wrinkles. Gently massage it into your skin, avoiding the eye area. Start using it 1-2 times a week and increase frequency as your skin builds tolerance.
    2. Step 2: Hyaluronic Cream After the Retinol Oil has absorbed (wait about 1-2 minutes), apply the Hyaluronic Cream. This will lock in moisture and deeply hydrate your skin, helping to combat the dryness that can come with retinol use.
    Always remember to apply sunscreen during the day, especially when using retinol, as it can make your skin more sensitive to the sun.

products.title: COSRX The Retinol 0.5 Oil 20ml
products.description: Feel the benefits of Retinol without irritation with The Retinol 0.5 Oil by COSRX. This rich and silky night oil provides a healthy glow and hydrated skin. A gentle but concentrated .5% of pure retinol improves the appearance of fine lines, creases, and wrinkles and enhances elasticity. This serum is safe for all skin types, and best for skin accustomed to retinol but still experiencing progressive signs of aging such as loss of elasticity and dryness. It's an intermediate-level retinol for those looking for a highly concentrated, youth booster. Vitamin A supports collagen production and skin cell turnover, squalene protects and moisturizes the skin, and vitamin E reduces visible signs of aging and skin damage. Formulated without fragrance, parabens, sulfates, artificial colors, alcohol, mineral oil, and silicone. BENEFITS • Improves the appearance of fine lines, creases, and wrinkles • Enhances skin elasticity • Improves skin radiance • Moisturizes & Nourishes TARGETS • Initial and progressive signs of aging and loss of firmness • Loss of skin elasticity & moisture • Acne, breakouts • Fine lines and wrinkles KEY INGREDIENTS • Pure retinol (Vitamin A) : Accelerates collagen production and skin turnover to improve fine lines • Plant-derived squalane : Protects the skin from external irritation • Tocotrienol (Super Vitamin E) : Reduces visible signs of aging and skin damage Expiry - 25.04.2026   Country of Origin: South Korea Manufacturer: Amore Pacific Co., Ltd. products.title: COSRX Dry & Aging Skin Duo
products.description:
The Dry & Aging Skin Duo skincare set features a peptide serum and a retinol cream that works to combat skin dryness, loss of elasticity, enlarged pores, and other aging signs. The peptide serum deeply hydrates and plumps the skin, while the retinol cream works to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, improve skin texture, and promote a youthful glow. Together, they work side by side to make your skin visibly firmer, smoother, and brighter.

This skincare set includes

  • 1 pc of COSRX The 6 Peptide Skin Booster Serum (150ml)
  • 1 pc of COSRX The Retinol 0.1 Cream (20ml)

Key benefits

  • Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles,
  • Minimizes the appearance of pores,
  • Improves skin elasticity and firmness,
  • Boosts hydration and plumps the skin,
  • Promotes a more even skin tone,
  • Refines skin texture.

Ideal for

  • Dry and mature skin,
  • Those concerned with wrinkles and fine lines,
  • Skin lacking firmness and elasticity,
  • Individuals seeking a brighter, more even complexion,
  • Those with rough or uneven skin texture.

productCategory.name: Face Serum & Ampoule
productCategory.description:
Face Serums & Ampoules: Targeted Treatments for Radiant Skin

Welcome to our Face Serums & Ampoules category, where potent formulations meet your skin's specific needs! These concentrated skincare products are designed to deliver active ingredients deep into the skin, addressing a variety of concerns such as hydration, aging, dullness, and uneven texture. Whether you're looking to enhance your glow or tackle specific skin issues, our selection of serums and ampoules has something for everyone.

What Are Face Serums & Ampoules?

Face Serumsare lightweight, fast-absorbing liquids packed with high concentrations of active ingredients. They are formulated to penetrate deeply into the skin, providing targeted treatment for specific concerns like fine lines, dark spots, and dryness.Ampoules, on the other hand, are similar to serums but typically contain a higher concentration of active ingredients and are often used as a short-term treatment to boost your skincare routine. They come in small vials or dropper bottles and are perfect for intensive care or when your skin needs an extra boost.

Explore Our Range

Our curated collection features a variety of face serums and ampoules tailored to address different skin types and concerns:

Hydrating Serums

  • Moisture Boosters: Formulated with hyaluronic acid, glycerin, and other humectants, these serums provide intense hydration, plumping the skin and leaving it soft and supple.

Brightening Serums

  • Radiance Enhancers: Infused with vitamin C, niacinamide, or licorice extract, these serums help to even out skin tone and reduce the appearance of dark spots for a luminous complexion.

Anti-Aging Ampoules

  • Youthful Glow: Packed with powerful ingredients like retinol, peptides, or antioxidants, these ampoules target fine lines and wrinkles while promoting elasticity for firmer skin.

Soothing Serums

  • Calm & Repair: Ideal for sensitive or irritated skin, these serums often contain soothing ingredients like aloe vera, chamomile, or centella asiatica to reduce redness and inflammation.

Key Benefits of Using Face Serums & Ampoules

Incorporating face serums and ampoules into your skincare routine offers numerous advantages:

  • Targeted Treatment: These products deliver concentrated active ingredients directly to the areas that need them most.

  • Enhanced Absorption: Lightweight formulations allow for deeper penetration into the skin compared to traditional moisturizers.

  • Customizable Routine: Easily layer serums and ampoules based on your specific skin concerns for a tailored approach.

  • Visible Results: Regular use can lead to noticeable improvements in texture, tone, and overall skin health.

How to Use Face Serums & Ampoules

  1. Cleanse: Start with a gentle cleanser to remove makeup and impurities from your face.

  2. Apply Toner (Optional): If you use a toner, apply it after cleansing to prepare your skin for better absorption.

  3. Use Serum or Ampoule: Dispense a few drops of serum or ampoule onto your fingertips. Gently press it into your skin using upward motions.

  4. Follow with Moisturizer: After the serum has absorbed, apply your favorite moisturizer to lock in hydration and nutrients.

  5. Continue Your Routine: Complete your regimen with sunscreen in the morning or additional treatments at night.

Conclusion

Transform your skincare routine with our premium selection of face serums and ampoules. Experience the power of concentrated treatments that target your unique skincare needs for healthier, more radiant skin! Shop now to find the perfect products tailored just for you.

products.title: 7-Day Skin Renewal Bakuchiol Trial Kit
products.description:
Curious about the buzz surrounding bakuchiol, the gentle plant-based alternative to retinol? Now's your chance to experience its transformative effects without breaking the bank! Introducing Our Budget-Friendly Bakuchiol Sample Set. For just ₹499, you can embark on a week-long (7-day) journey to smoother, more radiant skin with our By Wishtrend Bakuchiol Vitamin A-mazing Night Cream sample set. ⏰Limited Time Offer: Get your 7-day By Wishtrend Bakuchiol Cream sample set now and take the first step towards age-defying skin!

This trial kit includes

  • 7 pcs of By Wishtrend Vitamin A-mazing Bakuchiol Night Cream 1g: This gentle exfoliator works overtime to reduce fine lines and wrinkles, ensuring you wake up to skin that's smooth, soft, and youthful.

HOW TO USE

  • In your final step of your night-time skincare routine, apply the By Wishtrend Vitamin A-mazing Bakuchiol Night Cream on your face. Massage gently and pat lightly for better absorption.

products.title: COSRX 2-Step Dry Skin Relief Duo
products.description:
Is dry, flaky skin holding you back? Our 2-Step Dry Skin Relief Duo features a moisturizing cleanser/face wash and sunscreen that doubles as a moisturizer. This set is the ultimate solution for men seeking a simple yet effective skincare routine to combat dryness, flaky skin and irritation.

Skincare set includes:

  • 1 pc of COSRX Hydrium Triple Hyaluronic Moisturizing Cleanser 150ml: This gentle, hydrating cleanser is formulated with three types of hyaluronic acid to deeply moisturize and soothe dry, parched skin. It removes impurities without stripping away essential moisture, leaving your skin feeling soft and refreshed.
  • 1 pc of COSRX Aloe Soothing Sun Cream SPF50+ 50ml: This non-greasy and nourishing sunscreen provides broad-spectrum protection against harmful UV rays while providing intense hydration and soothing relief for dry, sensitive skin. Aloe vera extract helps to calm redness and irritation, leaving your skin feeling comfortable and protected.

KEY BENEFITS:

✅Deeply hydrates: Replenishes moisture in dry, parched areas of skin, preventing flakiness and discomfort. ✅Soothes irritation: Calms redness and inflammation, providing relief for dry, sensitive skin. ✅Protects against sun damage: Shields the skin from harmful UV rays, preventing premature aging and dark spots. ✅Non-greasy formula: Absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue, making it ideal for men who prefer a lightweight skincare routine. ✅Gentle on sensitive skin: Suitable for those with dry, irritated skin, providing a gentle yet effective solution.

IDEAL FOR:

✅Men seeking a simple, effective skincare routine to address dry, flaky skin. Our 2-Step Dry Skin Relief Duo provides the ultimate solution for healthy, hydrated skin.

HOW TO USE:

  1. Cleanse/Wash: Apply a small amount of the cleanser to your wet face and massage gently. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
  2. Sun Protection: Apply a generous amount of sunscreen to your face and neck. Reapply every 2-3 hours, especially after sweating or swimming.

This combination is perfect for achieving brighter, clearer, and more even-toned skin!

  5. Dynasty Cream: Provides deep hydration for dull, dehydrated skin, while improving skin texture, firmness, and boosting radiance.Don’t miss out on this exclusive deal—try it today or make someone’s day and gift the Hanbang Glow Ritual!

products.title: COSRX The Vitamin C 23 Serum 20ml
products.description:
Hypoallergenic 23% pure vitamin C - Highly concentrated serum that fades acne scars and brightens the complexion to revitalize dull and dry skin. BENEFITS • Fades acne scars and hyperpigmentation • Brightens dull skin • Firms and plumps • Diminishes fine lines and wrinkles • Antioxidant · Protects from environmental damage   TARGETS * Acne scars • Worried about hyperpigmentation caused by UV rays • Want to brighten their dull complexion • Uneven skin tone • Concerned about early signs of aging How To Use: After cleansing, during the serum step, shake the bottle lightly once or twice from side to side and apply a few drops to the skin. Use fingertips to gently massage and absorb the serum, starting from the inside of the face working towards the edges. Do not use it in the same routine as your exfoliators and retinols. Expiry:24.04.2026 Precautions for storing and handling high-content Vitamin C products
  1. Gas can be generated due to the nature of vitamin C.
  2. When opening the cap, it may make a sound.
  3. With a specially designed cap to seal vitamin C, it can be safely stored by controlling the gas generated inside the container.
  4. If you shake it before opening, it may overflow, so shake lightly, from left to right after fastening the pipette.
  5. Extra room in the container has been secured for safe use.
  6. Vitamin C products are recommended to be used within 2 months of opening due to easy discoloration caused by oxidation.
  7. Keep it away from high temperatures and direct sunlight.
  8. It is recommended to be stored in the refrigerator when it is not being used every day after fastening the pipette.
  9. Keeping it refrigerated can help maintain the freshness of the vitamin C. O KEEP REFRIGERATED (3~10°C) *
* Please use immediately after purchase and store upright in refrigerator once opened. *We do not exchange vitamin C serums. We restock our vitamin C monthly and store it in cool temperature until it’s shipped out to you to avoid oxidation. However pure vitamin C has a tendency to leak in hot weather during transit which is beyond our control. Hence pure vitamin C is only product that we do not offer exchange.   Country of Origin: South Korea Manufacturer: Amore Pacific Co., Ltd. Address: 37, Gajisanseopdong-ro, Osan-si, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea Importer: Beauty Barn Address: 983/18, Tajen Ao Road, Dimapur – 797112, Nagaland, India Packer: Amore Pacific Co., Ltd. Address: 37, Gajisanseopdong-ro, Osan-si, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea

products.title: BOJ  Age-Defying Ginseng Set
products.description:
SAVE 25% OFF when you get the BOJ Age-Defying Ginseng Set to boost elasticity, smooth fine lines, and brighten your complexion. Unlock Timeless Beauty with Beauty of Joseon's Ginseng Duo Experience the transformative power of Korean skincare with our Beauty of Joseon Ginseng Essence and Revive Serum duo. This potent combination harnesses the age-defying properties of ginseng to reveal your skin's natural radiance and youthful vitality. 1. Beauty of Joseon Ginseng Essence Water This lightweight yet powerful essence is your first step to luminous skin. Infused with 80% ginseng root water and 2% niacinamide, it deeply hydrates, brightens, and evens out skin tone. The silky texture absorbs quickly, prepping your skin for maximum serum absorption. 2. Beauty of Joseon revive serum This potent serum is the perfect complement to the Ginseng Essence Water, working to revitalize and rejuvenate your skin. Key ingredients include:
  • Ginseng Root Water (63%): Traditionally renowned for its skin-healing properties, this ingredient provides deep hydration and nourishment.
  • Snail Mucin (3%): Known for its skin-repairing benefits, this ingredient improves skin texture and elasticity.
The Revive Serum penetrates deeply into the skin, delivering powerful anti-aging benefits and leaving your complexion looking plump, smooth, and radiant. Together, these ginseng-powered products work in perfect synergy to:
  • Boost skin elasticity and firmness
  • Smooth fine lines and wrinkles
  • Even out skin tone and reduce hyperpigmentation
  • Deeply hydrate and nourish the skin
  • Enhance overall skin radiance and vitality
Guide: After cleansing and toning, dispense a small amount of the Ginseng Essence into your hands and gently pat it onto your face and neck. Let it absorb for a few seconds, preparing your skin for the next step. Once the essence has fully absorbed, take 1 pump of the Ginseng Revive Serum and massage it evenly onto your face and neck. Focus on areas prone to fine lines and wrinkles, like around the eyes and mouth. Pro Tip: Use both in your morning and evening skincare routine for best results. Follow up with your favorite moisturizer and sunscreen during the day to lock in the benefits.
